title: Indirect `google.golang.org/appengine` dependency
body:
Hi!

I get an indirect dependency in my project's `go.mod`
```
google.golang.org/appengine v1.6.6 // indirect
```

If you make `go mod tidy` on sqlx master branch you could see such diff:

```diff
--- a/go.mod
+++ b/go.mod
@@ -1,7 +1,10 @@
 module github.com/jmoiron/sqlx

+go 1.14
+
 require (
        github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql v1.4.0
        github.com/lib/pq v1.0.0
        github.com/mattn/go-sqlite3 v1.9.0
+       google.golang.org/appengine v1.6.6 // indirect
 )
diff --git a/go.sum b/go.sum
index a3239ad..8c22f72 100644
--- a/go.sum
+++ b/go.sum
@@ -1,6 +1,15 @@
 github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql v1.4.0 h1:7LxgVwFb2hIQtMm87NdgAVfXjnt4OePseqT1tKx+opk=
 github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql v1.4.0/go.mod h1:zAC/RDZ24gD3HViQzih4MyKcchzm+sOG5ZlKdlhCg5w=
+github.com/golang/protobuf v1.3.1/go.mod h1:6lQm79b+lXiMfvg/cZm0SGofjICqVBUtrP5yJMmIC1U=
 github.com/lib/pq v1.0.0 h1:X5PMW56eZitiTeO7tKzZxFCSpbFZJtkMMooicw2us9A=
 github.com/lib/pq v1.0.0/go.mod h1:5WUZQaWbwv1U+lTReE5YruASi9Al49XbQIvNi/34Woo=
 github.com/mattn/go-sqlite3 v1.9.0 h1:pDRiWfl+++eC2FEFRy6jXmQlvp4Yh3z1MJKg4UeYM/4=
 github.com/mattn/go-sqlite3 v1.9.0/go.mod h1:FPy6KqzDD04eiIsT53CuJW3U88zkxoIYsOqkbpncsNc=
+golang.org/x/crypto v0.0.0-20190308221718-c2843e01d9a2/go.mod h1:djNgcEr1/C05ACkg1iLfiJU5Ep61QUkGW8qpdssI0+w=
+golang.org/x/net v0.0.0-20190603091049-60506f45cf65/go.mod h1:HSz+uSET+XFnRR8LxR5pz3Of3rY3CfYBVs4xY44aLks=
+golang.org/x/sys v0.0.0-20190215142949-d0b11bdaac8a/go.mod h1:STP8DvDyc/dI5b8T5hshtkjS+E42TnysNCUPdjciGhY=
+golang.org/x/text v0.3.0/go.mod h1:NqM8EUOU14njkJ3fqMW+pc6Ldnwhi/IjpwHt7yyuwOQ=
+golang.org/x/text v0.3.2/go.mod h1:bEr9sfX3Q8Zfm5fL9x+3itogRgK3+ptLWKqgva+5dAk=
+golang.org/x/tools v0.0.0-20180917221912-90fa682c2a6e/go.mod h1:n7NCudcB/nEzxVGmLbDWY5pfWTLqBcC2KZ6jyYvM4mQ=
+google.golang.org/appengine v1.6.6 h1:lMO5rYAqUxkmaj76jAkRUvt5JZgFymx/+Q5Mzfivuhc=
+google.golang.org/appengine v1.6.6/go.mod h1:8WjMMxjGQR8xUklV/ARdw2HLXBOI7O7uCIDZVag1xfc=
```

This is a side-effect from mysql driver 1.4.0

But they dropped this custom appengine support since 1.5.0 - [changelog](https://github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql/blob/v1.5.0/CHANGELOG.md#version-15-2020-01-07)

So I suggest to update the required version, so your client won't recieve an indirect `google.golang.org/appengine` dependency anymore.
